website_summaries.verdict: Works well, but the Margaritaville Tahiti Frozen Concoction Maker has more to offer at a lower price.
pros: Features a large 25-serving capacity and solid construction
Easy to use and disassemble for cleaning
cons: Has the highest price tag of all the models on our short list

customer_reviews.title: Huh
customer_reviews.text: Auger doesn't adequately push contents down the spout. Look at the ice situation I have going after 24hrs!
customer_reviews.author: that guy

customer_reviews.title: Great drinks from this machine!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our Bourbon slushies, but have only tried it out on Margaritas. It does a great job! It look about 4 hours to get the room temp Costco mix to be slushie. We added a bunch of tripple sec and tequilla to make sure it flowed. We will have to work on the drink mixes. I did have to take apart the spout assembly and put the supplied vasaline on the gaskets as it leaked without it. It was a big hit. Drinks were awsome. I would recommend. Also, delivery was on time and as promised. No problems with with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: east bay redbird

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!!  Awesome machine to own and a big hit with the kids/adults!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to set up and comes packaged well in box while encased in Styrofoam! Parts list missed details on the 2nd stirrer in the back, but after some review it is easily attached to the lid assembly. I have 5:1 mix ( 5 parts water and 1 part mix) So I used 2 cups of Mix to 10 cups of water. Just gets over the top of the chrome covered chiller and makes a lot of yummy slush! I attached pictures to show the lid stirrer and the height based on kitchen cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: tkgibson

customer_reviews.title: Oil everything before using it. It may seem sealed but it will leak.
customer_reviews.text: I use the machine for margaritas. Works great so far. The only issue I have is that high seems too high and low just a little too low. Once the mix turns to slush you have to keep flipping back an forth between them for the consistency to stay right.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos smitherman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this machine for troops who are deployed. They use this machine every day after their missions for an awesome treat. They have had no problems except for running out of cups and slushy mix! This machine runs approximately 15 hours a day. Great purchase for a worthy group of individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need to get going.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made heavy duty slushee machine. I was surprised. It also comes with extra seals and some lube for the dispensing valve which you must use. I use this almost daily. Though I have made margaritas in it, I usually just make "slurpees" for the kids (and me). It does it all great. Get your mix, put it in, then wait a little while. I used chilled water which speeds the process up and I'm ready to go in 30-45 minutes. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this a few weeks ago and LOVE it already
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a few weeks ago and LOVE it already! The machine arrived quickly and perfectly cushioned in a huge box with lots of nice padding. We did a Margarita batch immediately and it was fabulous. The machine makes a nice slush (not too grainy or too icy). Based on other reviews we then tried a makeshift mudslide concoction (Kahlua, coffee, Baileys, etc) and it was also amazing. Even a grumpy guest who didn't want to try it at first ... came back for seconds! We were nervous about the price but now realize how great this is to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: GolfFan

customer_reviews.title: perfect small party margarita machine!
customer_reviews.text: The margarita machine actually arrived a few days before the estimated earliest delivery date. The item worked great but started to produced a loud fan noise during the first batch of margaritas. We contacted the Technical Support number and talked to Joe about it. He listened to the noise over the phone and said there was definitely something wrong and arranged to ship us a new one and pick up the original by Fedex. It arrived in two days and worked perfectly and is really quiet! Makes great margaritas and is very simple to use/maintain. Great product with really great service from Margarita Girl!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and seems pretty durable. Surprisingly
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the machine was as advertised. It is well constructed, and seems pretty durable. Surprisingly, the machine came with a margarita mix. Delicious. It worked perfectly, and the margarita slush was just the right consistency. However, it did take quite awhile (almost 2 hours) to slush up when I first used it. Aside from that, I have no complaints, and would consider buying from Margarita Girl again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Overall good machine, but it tends to leave slush towards ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall good machine , but it tends to leave slush towards the rear of the boul meaning I need to spoon it towards the front of the machine.
customer_reviews.author: LaKira

customer_reviews.title: This machine brought life to the party!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to clean. It froze the beverages quite quickly. We had rented one over the summer that was big and bulky and took an hour or more to freeze. This machine only took around 30 min or less to get the drinks going. It’s quite heavy and a little awkward to carry. But once it’s in place you are good to go. Please make sure you do a test run with water to make sure you have your tank on right. It is a great machine that is space saving and convenient for any gathering!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - it really works!
customer_reviews.text: We have served up about 6 rounds of slurpees to kids birthdays and even adult parties since purchasing this unit this past summer. I was a bit nervous about getting the sugar levels correct and making a good slush, but it is pretty easy to not screw up. I've just bought some random fruit punch mix or similar at the grocery and piled it in there with success. Cleanup is easy as long as you are near a sink. I typically just topple the thing into the sink and let everything drain out. I'm fully cleaned within about 5 mins of starting the process. Great bang for the buck on this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Haney

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Its works But bad design the should have a horizontal screw. When it gets low you have to scoope it out with a spoon cause the verticle screws don't touch fluid
customer_reviews.author: gary jakober

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommended it to my family members
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift the my dad for Christmas last year. My dad uses it at every family event now. My dad loves it. My family loves it. I definitely recommended it to my family members. Thank you again
customer_reviews.author: Annie P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for parties and summer fun!!
customer_reviews.text: The Margarita Girl mini frozen drink machine is just fantastic. It is easy to clean, very reliable, and has provided MANY frozen drinks for our friends and family. It works perfectly for adult alcohol frozen drinks and also makes a delicious frozen slushy out of just basic soda pop as well. I would highly recommend this product. Great for summer fun!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: this machine has made our parties so much more!! Great machine, great customer service!! We had a problem with the first machine we got, but we quickly and effortless received a replacement, again great customer service! We love this little machine--very well made and makes bush wackers perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Lowe

customer_reviews.title: A hit with the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: We live in the Gulf South and summer weather can be hard to survive. We got this machine to see if it could boost morale, and it has been great! We are learning to adapt our own recipes for it and are learning that all drinks can be slush-ified! Assembly is pretty obvious and the only trick is to make sure you have a good seal around the column before pouring your liquid in to be frozen! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plan Ahead
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, really pleased with it. Just plan ahead and give yourself a few hours to turn your mixture into your favorite margarita or slushy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: The Margarita Machine works great. We have been using it almost 4x per week. My boys love it. The hardest part about owning it is what flavor is next.
customer_reviews.author: Sean G.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed..
customer_reviews.text: Works great at 1st then freezes up and drinks wont come out.. When it gets down to last few drinks you cant get them out of the machine. Leaks too much out of drip hose (at least 2 drinks worth). Too costly for the problems I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Machine arrived much earlier than projected, which of course, was not a problem. It was easy to set up, easy to use and easy to clean. It will be a welcome addition to parties and much cheaper than the 3 gallon commercial machine that we usually rent.
customer_reviews.author: JJnJack

customer_reviews.title: Good, Quality Machine for Home use
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and good size for home use. Takes about 30-45 minutes to totally freeze up but once done works well. As a back auger and also front push auger to move slush out of the spout. Easy clean up of parts. Unit is fairly small for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Your Home Bar!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, Easy to clean, this machine is awesome. Nice and compact, fits on my bar counter perfectly. I can even lift it myself. I was looking for a small sized machine to do all my wine slush recipes and this does the trick perfectly.....no leftovers on New Years Eve!! It slushed up the drinks in a timely manor and the dispensing was nice and easy. I love my machine :)
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!!! My wife and I love it for Fri night together but it's also great for a party!!!! We have used it for our kids birthdays as a slushy machine they love it!!!! I've rented margarita machines for many years and this is finally a machine made for people that want a frozen drink at there home that tastes like it came from a restaurant or bar!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Fun machines and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a 1 star review bc one of the 2 machines I bought had a split center component but the customer service for this company was awesome and I got called in 10 mins of my bad review and they sent me a new one. The machines work great. I wish they had a temp regulator or a timer on them but they were a hit with our beach trip friends
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this Machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Machine. I was going for the industrial machine at first but too much of a hassle if your not a business and I'm glad I bought this one instead. Used it several times already. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured, just started using today, was easy to set up.. so let’s see how this goes 🤞🏽🤞🏽
customer_reviews.author: Alayshia Daniels

customer_reviews.title: The drink machine you want!!!
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box and into margarita mode... this thing is amazing and relatively quick to get your drinks ready... easy set up... easy clean up... love it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Forward

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for Christmas. It was a big hit with our gathering on Christmas Day. Super easy to use and clean. DELICIOUS.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Simply Okay
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. While it works like a charm it is not very high quality. Pieces feel cheap and flimsy. Best you can get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scandog33

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a long time for a personal machine that will freeze the product. This machine is perfect. The size fits on my counter and it makes the perfect amount. The company has been great to work with and has gone above and beyond to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Boone

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to a party!
customer_reviews.text: Love love our machine! Had an open house and served 7 gallons of margaritas in one day! She held up nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Zumwalt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a total of 3 times so far and it has worked great. It takes about an hour to make margaritas. I've also used it to make frozen strawberry lemonade. It is handy to have and I love that it plugs.into a regular outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Keck

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: My family and friends enjoy this machine so much. It makes great margaritas and great slashes for the kids. Very easy to clean. Very easy to wrk too. I would recommend this machine it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Harry esmez

customer_reviews.title: How long before it’s totally ready
customer_reviews.text: It’s been running for an hour and this is what we have the kids are excited and can’t wait for it to totallly slush up ??? I don’t no hopefully it will be ready soon But so far so good easy setup
customer_reviews.author: Damone Dent

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and we have had a blast experimenting with different drinks. We have yet to make a margarita, we've made ice cream drinks, kids drinks and daiquiris, all delicious. It was received as promised, in plenty of time for Father's Day. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use! Literally pulled it out of the box cleaned it and started using it. We put Gatorade in it to make slushies on really hot days to help us stay hydrated. We've put coke in a few times as well. This thing is great! Definitely recommend. This would be great for a cookout or party.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Waelde

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Cools off quick and makes perfect margaritas every time. Clean up is super easy. I do however recommend if you are having a big party to pre-chill your mix stuff in the freezer or refrigerator. It speeds up the slush time when the mix starts out colder.
customer_reviews.author: todd jones

customer_reviews.title: We love the Margarita Girl!
customer_reviews.text: We love the Margsrita Girl! Almost every weekend we will turn it on and have people over to enjoy the margaritas or other forms of slushees. It does take about 2 hours to get the right consistency so you have to plan when you will be wanting the drinks. Clean up can be a pain but overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: I read up on several different machines before purchasing this machine. The only problems I have had have been user error (me). The works very well and make great slushies.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Best party bartender.
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying the machine. We bought it for a party, and it was a hit! It's good for small or large get together's.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for my business making drinks. This worked perfectly to compliment what I already had and all of my customers are satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Shepard Bates

customer_reviews.title: Drips continuously
customer_reviews.text: What a POS. Right out of the box, wont hold water. Replaced O rings. Still won't hold water. The drain tube points to the floor, not to the plastic tray. Plastic tray slants down, doesn't sit flat. Minimal, if any, directions come with it. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective!
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been renting Margarita machines for various parties at my home. When I first unpacked the machine I thought it was too small, but it delivered. Once it gets going it freezes quickly and clean up is extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Slushie Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived on time. We use at all of our get together . Everyone likes it so much I wish I would have gotten the double tank.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Doyle Leagon Jr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer slushy fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband and it has been a gift to the entire family. Margaritas and other fruit slush drinks are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lida Buckner

customer_reviews.title: Buy one if your thing about it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best. It’s well worth the money it’s expensive but it’s a good piece of equipment. Make a lot of rum runners margaritas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feed Back
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for y'all highly qualified business I greatly appreciate your help y'all are a great company I would recommend anyone to y'all. Because You talk to customers nice and work out their problems I am very thankful for the margarita girl machine company They are real great I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you like frozen drinks! Its easy and works well! Good made product just a bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Newbold

customer_reviews.title: We love ours!
customer_reviews.text: We love our machine. Works great, easy to clean. Nice and compact and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this machine
customer_reviews.text: We love this machine. It's the perfect size for small parties and weekend drinks. It's so easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tommi K Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer for the Office
customer_reviews.text: This machine has really changed our office! We now have frozen Fridays where people sign up to make a different frozen concoction. Our favorite so far has been Frose!
customer_reviews.author: asixec

customer_reviews.title: This machine is a must have.
customer_reviews.text: The machine was really easy to use. The margaritas were delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Love the quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love the quick delivery. It was easy to set up and use and clean. My only regret is not getting a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: GayLynn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Owner was easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these. Both did not work. Owner was easy to work with, returned them and received our money back.
customer_reviews.author: Terri C.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this machine
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our little office! We use it all the time for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Cratejoy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product! Just make sure you put it together carefully and correctly otherwise it will leak.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and keeps the margarita nice and cold
customer_reviews.text: Been a huge hit at home and at our clothing boutique! Very easy to use and keeps the margarita nice and cold! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Celebrated my 50th birthday with at least 100 guests. This machine was perfect! Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and packaged well! Great quality! Love the product! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: B Farmer

customer_reviews.title: yes I'd like that but it was hard to figure out it ...
customer_reviews.text: yes I'd like that but it was hard to figure out it was making up first but then we figured it out it's good to have this we don't have to be making a lot of margaritas in the blender I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value/ great product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected. It was exactly as described and within a hour we had our first set of frozen drinks❗️Great product and a great value. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tom Moore

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for small gatherings or for a weekend of endless ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a dream come true!! It is perfect for small gatherings or for a weekend of endless frozen drinks enjoying sports events on the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!!!! During a summer we enjoy vodka redbull slushy and kids enjoy coolaid slushy.We all happy and love this machine!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, delivery experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my wife. Plugged it in, filled it up, turned it on and had wine slushes within an hour! Great purchase, delivery experience, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little frozen drink machines
customer_reviews.text: A great machine for the price. It makes all different kinds of frozen drinks. Have had no problems and is easybto set up.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase caused me to get drunk 8 times so far purchased four weeks ago👍🏻💪🏻😎Margarita vill

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've always wanted
customer_reviews.text: Always dreamed of having a slushy machine. This one doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: nathan perez

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for us
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great for us. Just the right size for a small group around the pool. Had to experiment a little to get the mixture right, but now we are Margarita experts..
customer_reviews.author: Lan Cook

customer_reviews.title: Margarita Machine
customer_reviews.text: We love our margarita machine. It works great and is a hit at all of our parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Viva Margarita!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fast shipping. Works great. Easy to use. Highly recommend. Great drink mixes to go along with product as well. We love our margarita machine.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and well made
customer_reviews.text: Works well for small parties. Makes excellent wine slushies. Easy to use and clean.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine not to big just the right size worth it

customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is a nice size for inside the kitchen our out by the pool.

customer_reviews.text: My this unit is fantastic and make slush in 2 hrs and good , so happy we bought it.

customer_reviews.text: I really like it very ligth , take less space then other bigger ones , its worth buying i have no regrets at all , i Bougth it How i expect it .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only regret I have is that I wish I would have bought the double!

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for 3 parties and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Received machine quickly. I have used it for 3 parties and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service, to match fantastic machine
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much, we just purchased a lake home and are planning many refreshing summer adult beverages. I received the machine prior to the scheduled day. I researched the internet and could not find a comparable product at this price. This machine matched the internet description exactly. Would recommend to everyone. CHEERS
customer_reviews.author: billie F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Follow recipes or make up your own
customer_reviews.author: Thad Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This was the best investment I could have ever made. I Absolutely love the machine

customer_reviews.title: ... single for my Salon and Day Spa its work great!
customer_reviews.text: I used Margarita girt single for my Salon and Day Spa its work great!
customer_reviews.author: Chi Truong

customer_reviews.title: Fun party machine :)
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great. We have used it for several parties and it makes amazing pina coladas as well as margaritas. We are very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rita's!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my margarita machine. Would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loving My Product Its Simple To Use No Hassles And Makes Drinks In No Time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. We used it for our family reunion (100 people) and it ran for two days straight, we went thru 10 gallons of mix and the machine never faltered. It was very easy to set up. the only issue I had with it was the drip tray does not stay on very well. Other than that it was great. I really liked that with the machine I received extra o-rings and lubricant, so when they wear out I am ready to keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Even though I did not end up keeping the unit because it was not quite what I was expecting; I am providing a 5 Star rating due to their outstanding customer support. I was very happy with the responsiveness of the team at Margarita Girl and would feel more then comfortable purchasing from them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd McCarley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cycle, so you have to baby sit turning ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cycle, so you have to baby sit turning the machine off and on. If you have any mix left, you can't leave over night.
customer_reviews.author: Tex111

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine, works well with pre mix or own recipes
customer_reviews.author: Arun Malik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife but we both use it. You can pour a 2 liter bottle of a soft drink in it and it turns it into a sluchee. Kool aid, coke, Pepsi. It works great. Customer service was excellent. It is of commercial quality. Just like one you might see in a bar or small movie theater. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Margarita Girl after a bad experience with a competing product arriving with a defective compressor. The shipping and price was a little more for the Margarita Girl than the competitor, however I wish I had gone with Margarita Girl the first time because it arrived quickly and works great. I look forward to playing around with it more in the future! The compact form factor is a huge plus in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: DMoney

customer_reviews.title: Here’s where the party starts!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun addition to camping weekends! Not sure why they want warmth assessed on the starts- it’s not at all it’s super cool! Makes slushees one about an hour to hour and half depending on sugar content it seems. Makes super delicious frozen drinks alcohol or not. Easy to clean and assemble. Update: Best purchase of 2020! I’m still so happy with this purchase. Have used this regularly this summer and have no complaints. Company and product are highly recommended and would buy again from them.
customer_reviews.author: Allicent

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to use and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: The Margarita Girl Single-Bowl Mini is Awesome, we love it and have fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: James J. Geoffroy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome way to make your own slushy drinks!
customer_reviews.text: So after being in WA wine and cider country we came across the slushy. Ordered this machine and it was quick, easy to operate and makes awesome slushees of any variety. We even loaned it to neighbors for events. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: David Marod

customer_reviews.title: Good value/good results
customer_reviews.text: The Margarita Girl single bowl was just purchased two months ago and it was a great investment for the price point. The ease with of use and resulting drinks is very good. It is a little tricky to clean but well worth the effort. It is half the price of other units and just as effective for home use
customer_reviews.author: randy Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Defective Fan which makes a lot of noise
customer_reviews.text: Modified review: The seller contacted me after the review and made everything right. I hate that I had to go through all of the hassle but we received it in time for my wife's birthday and t works now. The machine takes about 2.5-3hrs to make the drink a perfect Margarita. 1 star review: The Margarita Machine arrived much earlier than I expected but when I turned it on the fan started making a very loud noise. I'm pretty sure the fan is either damaged or hitting something. This is not normal. Waiting on a response from the seller. I did find other things wrong with it but they are not worth mentioning. I just expected better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy !
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to clean. Easy to use. Have made at least 30 batches of frozen coke, juice, coffee etc with no problems. A real hit at the beach house!
customer_reviews.author: stephen salek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: took this with me on vacation and it was a hit
customer_reviews.author: Mona Esparza

product_meta.title: Margarita Girl Single-Bowl Mini Size Margarita Slush Frozen Drink Machine
product_meta.description: Unlike smaller beverage blenders that simply crush ice, Margarita Girl's Single-Bowl Mini Size Margarita Machine makes up to 25 CUPS of frozen margaritas, daiquiris, pina coladas, and more to keep the party going!
feature_bullets: High-capacity machine makes 25 CUPS of frozen margaritas and more!
Industry-leading 2-year parts warranty backed by a U.S. service center
Durable construction with high-impact plastic and stainless steel panels
1/5 HP air-cooled compressor, consistency control, freeze-up protection
20" high x 10" wide x 12" deep; NOT INTENDED FOR COMMERCIAL USE
